question: Humayun Nama was written by which of the following authors?
explanation: Gulbadan Begum was a Mughal princess and the daughter of Emperor Babur,who is the founder of the Mughal Empire. She is best known as the author of Humayun-Nama, the account of the life of her half-brother, Emperor Humayun, which she wrote on the request of her nephew, Emperor Akbar.
